item.title: Hello, world!
item.description:
After neglecting my personal website for quite some time, I finally managed to polish it a bit ðŸŽ‰

The site is still statically generated by Zola based on a few simple HTML templates and published via GitHub Pages. However, I found tailwindcss very pleasant to work with, so I used it to create a custom theme.

I'm intent on filling the blog with some content over the coming months (this time for real ðŸ˜‰), so let's see where this goes...
